data.name: verification_flow_conflict_resolved_to_existing
data.comment: VF005: Conflict resolved, existing session is active.

data.name: verification_flow_conflict_unresolved
data.comment: VF006: Could not resolve session conflict.

data.name: verification_flow_reused_and_updated
data.comment: VF004: An existing pending session was found and its expiration updated.

data.name: verification_flow_conflict
data.value: Active session exists; finish or cancel first.
data.comment: VF003: Attempt to start a new session while another is active.

data.name: verification_flow_expired
data.value: Session expired; start a new one.
data.comment: VF002: The verification session timed out.

data.name: verification_flow_not_found
data.comment: VF001: User's verification session couldn't be located or is invalid.

data.name: verification_flow_not_verified
data.value: Session not verified; please complete verification.
data.comment: VF009: The verification session exists but is not yet verified.

data.name: verification_session_not_found
data.value: Verification details not found; please retry.
data.comment: Specific to create_membership: the required verification session was not found.

data.name: otp_invalid
data.comment: VF101: Incorrect OTP provided by the user.

data.name: otp_expired
data.value: OTP expired; request a new one.
data.comment: VF102: OTP validity period has passed.

data.name: otp_generation_failed
data.value: OTP couldn't be generated; try again.
data.comment: VF104: System error during OTP generation.

data.name: otp_max_attempts_reached
data.value: Too many OTP attempts; wait or contact support.
data.comment: VF103: Too many failed OTP attempts.

data.name: otp_not_verified
data.value: OTP not verified; please enter the code.
data.comment: VF105: The OTP for the session has not been successfully verified yet.

data.name: phone_invalid
data.comment: VF202: User-facing message for invalid phone number format.

data.name: sms_send_failed
data.value: SMS failed; check number or retry.
data.comment: VF201: User-facing message for SMS failure.

data.name: data_concurrency_conflict
data.comment: VF302: User-facing message for data concurrency/staleness.

data.name: data_access_failed
data.value: Data access issue; try again later.
data.comment: VF301: Generic data access issue message for user.

data.name: security_rate_limit_exceeded
data.value: Too many requests; wait and retry.
data.comment: VF401: User-facing message for rate limiting.

data.name: security_suspicious_activity
data.comment: VF402: User-facing message for detected suspicious activity.

data.name: membership_too_many_attempts
data.value: Too many membership attempts; wait {0} min or contact support.
data.comment: VF403: Too many attempts to create or modify membership. {0} is wait minutes.

data.name: signin_too_many_attempts
data.value: Too many sign-in attempts; wait {0} min or contact support.
data.comment: VF404: Too many sign-in attempts. {0} is wait minutes.

data.name: activity_status_invalid
data.comment: VF505: Provided activity status is invalid.

data.name: app_device_created_but_invalid_id
data.value: Device registered but ID issue; contact support.
data.comment: VF504: App device was created but its ID is problematic for association.

data.name: app_device_invalid_id
data.comment: VF503: Provided app device ID is invalid or not found.

data.name: associated
data.comment: Outcome from ensure_phone_number: existing phone associated with device.

data.name: phone_cannot_be_empty
data.comment: VF506: Validation: phone number field is required.

data.name: created_and_associated
data.comment: Outcome from ensure_phone_number: new phone created and associated.

data.name: exists
data.comment: Outcome from ensure_phone_number: phone number found.

data.name: phone_number_not_found
data.value: Phone number not found for login.
data.comment: Outcome from login_membership: phone number not registered.

data.name: phone_not_found
data.comment: VF502: Phone number does not exist in the system (general use).

data.name: validation_failed
data.comment: VF501: Generic message when multiple validation errors occur on a form.

data.name: invalid_credentials
data.comment: VF531: User-facing: Invalid credentials provided during authentication.

data.name: password_complexity_requirements
data.value: Password must be {0}+ chars with upper, lower, number, special.
data.comment: VF530: {0} = minimum length. Summary of password rules.

data.name: password_empty
data.comment: VF513: User-facing: Password field is required.

data.name: password_hash_error
data.comment: VF521: Internal error, generic message to user.

data.name: password_hash_input_empty
data.comment: VF520: Internal error, generic message to user.

data.name: password_invalid_chars
data.comment: VF519: User-facing: Disallowed characters in password.

data.name: password_config_hash_algorithm_unsupported
data.comment: VF512: Internal config error, user action is to contact support.

data.name: password_config_iterations_invalid
data.comment: VF510: Internal config error, user action is to contact support.

data.name: password_config_salt_size_invalid
data.comment: VF511: Internal config error, user action is to contact support.

data.name: password_missing_digit
data.comment: VF517: User-facing: Password complexity requirement.

data.name: password_missing_lowercase
data.comment: VF515: User-facing: Password complexity requirement.

data.name: password_missing_special_char
data.comment: VF518: User-facing: Password complexity requirement (e.g., !@#$).

data.name: password_missing_uppercase
data.comment: VF516: User-facing: Password complexity requirement.

data.name: password_too_short
data.comment: VF514: {0} = minimum length. User-facing: Password length requirement.

data.name: password_verify_base64_error
data.comment: VF525: Internal error, generic message to user.

data.name: password_verify_error
data.comment: VF529: Internal error, generic message to user.

data.name: password_verify_hash_size_mismatch
data.comment: VF527: Internal error, generic message to user.

data.name: password_verify_input_empty
data.comment: VF522: Internal error, generic message to user.

data.name: password_verify_invalid_format
data.comment: VF524: Internal error, generic message to user.

data.name: password_verify_mismatch
data.comment: VF528: User-facing: Password entered does not match stored password.

data.name: password_verify_salt_size_mismatch
data.comment: VF526: Internal error, generic message to user.

data.name: password_verify_stored_hash_empty
data.comment: VF523: Internal error, generic message to user.

data.name: inactive_membership
data.comment: VF603: The membership account is not currently active.

data.name: invalid_secure_key
data.comment: VF602: The provided secure key is incorrect.

data.name: membership_already_exists
data.comment: VF606: A membership for this phone number and device already exists.

data.name: membership_not_found
data.comment: VF601: No membership associated with the provided details.

data.name: secure_key_cannot_be_empty
data.comment: VF604: Secure key is required.

data.name: secure_key_not_set
data.value: Secure key not set up for this membership.
data.comment: The membership exists but a secure key has not been established yet.

data.name: secure_key_too_long
data.comment: VF605: The provided secure key exceeds the maximum allowed length.

data.name: secure_key_updated
data.comment: Confirmation that the secure key was updated.

data.name: created
data.comment: Generic success message for creation operations.

data.name: generic_error
data.comment: VF999: User-facing catch-all for unspecified errors, encouraging retry.

data.name: generic_no_result_returned
data.comment: VF1001: Generic error when an expected result is not returned from an operation.

data.name: generic_success
data.comment: VF998: Generic success message.

data.name: generic_unexpected_outcome
data.comment: VF1000: Generic error for unexpected results or states.

data.name: phone_parsing_invalid_country_code
data.value: Invalid country code in phone number.
data.comment: Phone number parsing: Country code is not valid.

data.name: phone_parsing_too_short
data.comment: Phone number parsing: Number is too short to be valid.

data.name: phone_parsing_too_long
data.comment: Phone number parsing: Number is too long to be valid.

data.name: phone_parsing_invalid_number
data.comment: Phone number parsing: General invalid number format.

data.name: phone_parsing_possible_but_local_only
data.value: Number might be valid locally; add country code or region.
data.comment: Phone number parsing: Number seems like a local number without country context.

data.name: phone_parsing_generic_error
data.comment: Phone number parsing: A generic error occurred during parsing.

data.name: phone_validation_unexpected_error
data.comment: An unexpected internal error occurred during phone number validation steps.
